msItem.title: Jyske Lov
Provincial law of Jutland
Jyske Lovs Fortale
The prologue
msItem.incipit: Mæth logh skall land bygges æn uilde hwar man oruæs at siit eghet
msItem.explicit: och thæræ til mæth alle bæstæ mæntz raat thær i hans riki wæræ

msItem.title: Liber primus
msItem.incipit: Barn om thet wrther kristnæth standæ arff ok æi æller
msItem.explicit: fra annæns mansz mylnæ æller fiskæ garthææller æller fra annæns mansz iorth

msItem.title: Chapter list of Book II
msItem.rubric: Incipiunt capitula in libro secundo Capitulum primum .i.
msItem.explicit: cxiii. Om man stæl i lething

msItem.title: Liber secundus
msItem.rubric: Incipit liber secundus. vm sannænd mæn Capitulum primum
msItem.incipit: Sannænd mæn skulæ wæræ attæ i hwært hæræth
msItem.explicit: ok gaaf han hanum æi førræ æn han heem kom tha skal han wæri siik mæth tolf mænsz eth

msItem.title: Chapter list of Book III
msItem.rubric: Incipiunt capitula in libro tertio. Capitulum .i.

msItem.title: Liber tertius
msItem.rubric: Incipit liber tertius Capitulum primum. vm lething.
msItem.incipit: ??hær lething biuthæs wt e swo mannugh sum i en ha??æ
msItem.explicit: ællær lægg wt thæn thær eld sættæi først

msItem.rubric: f. 113v:4-8Explicit liber legis danorum. Anno domini milesimo quadringentesimo quinquagesimo septimo. Jnfra octauam beati bartholomei apostoli gloriosi etcetera
msItem.note: The division of the law text in three book is the traditional, but the chapter division it seems is not, as two chaptes here and there have been put together under one rubric. Each book is preceded by an index.

msItem.title: Christoffer I's forordning (Den Abel-Christofferske forordning II) [1252-1259]
msItem.incipit: Umbotzmæn ther taghe koningx læn / the skulle swærie paa then helghe læst
msItem.explicit: En sæchter vmbotzman noger man fore the gotz han er frafare wærie siigh met syne xii frendher

msItem.title: Lov af 26. maj 1284 (Erik Klippings nyborgske forordning for Nørrejylland)
msItem.rubric: bondæ ma ey giffue syn iord burt
msItem.incipit: Thet skall man withe at bonde maa ey giffue syn iordh burth till kirke

msItem.title: Erik Klippings nyborgske forordning for Nørrejylland af 21-27. maj 1284
msItem.rubric: Her effter begynnes then ny handfestning
msItem.incipit: THenne logh gaff koning Erick Cristofferssø effter at wor herræ wor fødh tusindæ winter tuhundrethæ firesynne tyuwæ of fire winter
msItem.explicit: Then mynt i siæland ær han schall waræ om godh som then i Iudlandh ær

bibl.title: Den danske rigslovgivning indtil 1400
bibl.note: Variant readings in the apparatus, signature Ab20.

msItem.title: Erik Klippings nyborgske forordning for Sjælland af 26. maj 1284
msItem.incipit: Alt thetklethe ther køpmæn haffue at sæliæ
msItem.explicit: oc the toghe ther alle samen with met frii wiliæ &tc Explicit istud ...

bibl.title: Den danske rigslovgivning indtil 1400
bibl.note: Variant readings in the apparatus, signature Ag8.

msItem.title: Erik Klippings håndfæstning af 29. juli 1282
Constitutio Erici Glipping, nuburgis anno 1282
msItem.incipit: ERicus dei gracia Danorum Sclauorumque Rex omnibus presens scriptum cernentibus In domino Salutem Ad perpetuam rei memoriam
msItem.explicit: sua sigilla vna cum nostro Sigillo apponere curaverunt &tc Explicit

bibl.title: Den danske rigslovgivning indtil 1400
bibl.note: Variant readings in the apparatus, signature Ad8.

msItem.title: Erik Klippings nyborgske forordning for Sjælland af 26. maj 1284
msItem.incipit: STuth skall hwer man redhæ a sancti andries dagh
msItem.explicit: En skeer han oc slaar tha inne han for syn iordh som foruit star

bibl.title: Den danske rigslovgivning indtil 1400
bibl.note: Variant readings in the apparatus, signature Af9.

msItem.title: Rætterthing dom
msItem.rubric: Thete hauer righens radh saght for rætte
msItem.incipit: Item thete tucker oss ware ræt

msItem.title: Christoffer I's forordning (Den Abel-Christofferske Forordning II)
msItem.incipit: Um waldzman wrøhær annen ok wordher han wunnen athawe sagd konung vsaat
msItem.explicit: bøtæ hin hanum kærer all sin howetloth ok hans hals wære i konungs wald etc

msItem.incipit: Item withnær nogher man pa thinge ellar ær i logh eller
msItem.explicit: tha fellær han ey vthen sigh selff

msItem.title: Kyns neffnd
msItem.incipit: For thiisse saghe scall man wæries meth kyns neffn
msItem.explicit: tha gangher han i konighens iern meth rætthæ

layout.p: One column; 16-18 lines; written area: 98 x 75 mm. Rubricated.

handDesc.p: Textualis libraria in the main text, ff. 2r-113v.

decoNote.p: All decoration is in the first part of the manuscript dated to 1457 and is likely to have been executed by the original scribe/rubricator. The larger initials mark the beginning of the main sections in the Jutish Law.
Seven small red initials with simple decoration, extended serifs or fillings in a second colour at ff. 35r (index of Book II), 82v, 84r (index of Book III), 104r, 104v, 106v, 108v.

Four larger 3-7-line initials in dark and light red as well as brown ink. The decoration in brown and light red ink was not originally intended but probably added by the time the scribe had reached the initial T at f. 86r, the only initial both conceptualized and executed as multicoloured.
at f. 2rlarge initial (an uncial M) in red with simple filigranated decoration and a vertically extended serif decorated with short strokes; first letter in the prologue
at f. 7rsemilarge initial (B), dark red filled with light red, and surrounded by brown geometric decoration and circumscribed by a light red double frame; index of Book I
at f. 39rlarge initial (S) in red with brown filigranated decoration and brown outer contour; Book II
at f. 86rlarge initial (T) in red and brown with filigranated filling and inscribed in a square with geometric decoration; Book III

binding.p: Parchment binding with turned fore-edge. Sweden, 17th century, before 1659 according to the dating on the back pastedown: Datum Stockholm Den 8 Januari Annj 1659. Ericus Schult. Size: 145 x 110 x 40 mm.

Parchment binding over pasteboards with turned fore-edge. Flat spine, hollow back. Manuscript title from 20th century in ink on the back: Jutske logh 1457. Blind-tooled library label of paper. Endbands of green silk embroidered on white leather thong and laced through the covers. Edges trimmed. Plain single flyleaves and pastedowns of paper. Single flyleaf of parchment at the front preserved from former binding. All along sewing on four double white leather thongs laced through the covers.

foliation.p: Foliated in pencil in upper right corner by modern cataloguer.

additions.p: Marginal notes in pencil by the librarian August Palm (1826-1907) on ff. 114-126.

origin.p: The Jutish Law is dated to 1457, end of August, on f. 113v: Explicit liber legis danorum. Anno domini milesimo quadringentesimo quinquagesimo septimo. Jnfra octauam beati bartholomei apostoli gloriosi etcetera. The law texts on ff. 114-129 are younger additions.
On f. 129v an owner's statement is written: iste liber pertinet ad me.

provenance.p: Former owners: Erik Schult (according to a dated inscription on the inside of the back board) in 1659, the rural dean H. Sederberg, Carlshamn, and subsequently his daughter's son, a certain Magister Seldener, Carlshamn. Purchased by Anders Lanærus on May 4, 1774, as stated on the inside of the front board.

acquisition.p: Entered the University Library after the death of Lanærus.

source.p: Catalogued and encoded during 2001 by Anne Mette Hansen.

bibl.author: Hedlund, Monica
bibl.title: Katalog der datierten Handschriften in lateinischer Schrift vor 1600 in Schweden, Bd. II, Die Handschriften Schwedens ausgenommen UB Uppsala

bibl.author: Palm, August Johan Theod.
bibl.title: Anteckningar till medeltidshandskrifterna i Lunds Universitetsbiblotek (handwritten notes kept in a box at the manuscript department.
